title: [Medicine] Genetic risk may outweigh age as a predictor of whether adults 65 & older will develop Alzheimer’s disease, new research suggests. The study combines genetic risk scores with demographic & EHR data in machine learning models to rank-order risk factors’ links to an eventual Alzheimer’s diagnosis.
[Epidemiology] The relationship between vitamin K and metabolic dysfunction-associated fatty liver disease among the US population: the National Health and Nutrition
